_comment: For more information about the format of this file, see README.md in the autochecklist package.
name: mcr_setup

subtasks.name: turn_on_cam4
subtasks.description: Turn on camera 4 (the camera on the tripod).

subtasks.name: turn_on_sound_computer
subtasks.description: Turn on the sound computer.

subtasks.name: activate_external_output
subtasks.description: Open last week's preset in vMix, turn on both monitors, and activate the external output in vMix.

subtasks.name: turn_on_ndi_controller
subtasks.description: Turn on the NDI controller.

subtasks.name: check_cop_events
subtasks.description: Check that the main event and rebroadcast events have been created *and have content*. If not, follow the instructions at https://github.com/recc-tech/tech/wiki/Creating-Events-on-Church-Online-Platform.

subtasks.name: check_boxcast_events
subtasks.description: Check that the Kids Connection event and main event are set up on BoxCast. Also check that the YouTube and Facebook destinations are there for the main event but *not* for the Kids Connection event. If the events are not set up properly, follow the instructions at https://github.com/recc-tech/tech/wiki/Creating-Live-Events-on-BoxCast.

subtasks.name: check_cameras
subtasks.description: Check the cameras. If any of the band members are in a bad position (e.g., blocking someone else), ask them to move. If the cameras are laggy or unresponsive, see https://github.com/recc-tech/tech/wiki/MCR-Visuals-Troubleshooting#the-ptz-cameras-arent-working.

subtasks.name: check_sound
subtasks.description: Check that vMix is receiving sound from the MCR sound station. If not, see https://github.com/recc-tech/tech/wiki/MCR-Visuals-Troubleshooting#theres-no-sound-coming-from-the-sound-station.

subtasks.name: download_assets
subtasks.description: Download the Kids Connection Video, sermon notes (if they're present), and any other new assets (e.g., new bumper videos, new announcements). Move the Kids Connection video and sermon notes to %{ASSETS_BY_SERVICE_DIR}%. Move the other new assets to %{ASSETS_BY_TYPE_DIR}%.

subtasks.name: create_kids_connection_playlist
subtasks.description: In vMix, replace last week's kids video with this week's video in the Kids Connection list input.

subtasks.name: restart_videos
subtasks.description: Restart all the videos and loops.

subtasks.name: update_titles
subtasks.description: In vMix, update the pre-stream title loop, the speaker's title, the host's title, and the title for anyone else that will make an announcement.

subtasks.name: save_vmix_preset
subtasks.description: Save the vMix preset as a new file. Click 'Save As' and save the new file to %{VMIX_PRESET_FILE}%.

subtasks.name: publish_sermon_notes
subtasks.description: Publish the sermon notes to Church Online Platform, first to the main event, then to the rebroadcast events. IMPORTANT: check at the bottom of the page that you are ONLY modifying the correct events (today's main event the first time and today's rebroadcasts the second time).

subtasks.name: start_stream
subtasks.description: Once it's time for the Kids Connection broadcast, mute other sounds (LR on the sound computer and the NDI source), play the Kids Connection playlist, and start the stream. Check in Church Online Platform's Host Tools that the stream is working.

subtasks.name: set_up_in_annex
subtasks.description: Copy the kids video to the laptop and set up the laptop and TV in the Annex. IMPORTANT: bring the laptop charger to the Annex too; the laptop dies quickly.

subtasks.name: start_recording
subtasks.description: After the Kids Connection broadcast, start recording the stream.

subtasks.name: download_message_notes
subtasks.description: Copy the message notes from Planning Center Online (the ones that say which slides to make) and save them in %{MESSAGE_NOTES_FILE}%.

subtasks.name: generate_backup_slides
subtasks.description: Create backup slides for the message notes and verses. See https://github.com/recc-tech/tech/wiki/Generating-Backup-Slides.

subtasks.name: import_backup_slides
subtasks.description: Close the previous week's backup slides and import the new backup slides into the 'Verses' category in vMix.

subtasks.name: import_other_assets
subtasks.description: Import the other new assets into vMix.

subtasks.name: archive_old_assets
subtasks.description: If you have time, clear out outdated files. For each outdated file, close the input in vMix and move the file to %{ASSETS_BY_TYPE_ARCHIVE_DIR}%.

subtasks.name: check_github_checklist
subtasks.description: Once you're done setting up, double-check that all tasks (especially automatic ones) have been completed properly using the checklist on GitHub: https://github.com/recc-tech/tech/issues.

subtasks.name: follow_planning_center_plan
subtasks.description: On Planning Center Online, open the live view of today's plan.
